roleplaying.title: D&D Spellbook
roleplaying.description: A spell lookup utility for Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition
points: Built a user interface using TailwindCSS to display spell data
Created calls to a free, public API to get list/spell data and stored it in a React state
Implemented filters on both spell level and class to allow users to find spells quickly

roleplaying.title: Dice Roller
roleplaying.description: Dice rolling utility for tabletop role-playing games
points: Created a simple and effective UI using Tailwind CSS to display dice and roll results
Used React hooks to store user input and dice roll results
Targeted a user persona of a Game Master who needs to roll dice quickly and efficiently with multiple dice types

financial.title: Loan Value Calculator
financial.description: A simple loan calculator to determine the value of a loan based on interest rate and term
points: Built a user interface using TailwindCSS to display loan data
Used React hooks to store user input and calculate loan value
Implemented a simple form validation to ensure user input is valid

financial.title: Interest Rate Calculator

points: Built a user interface using TailwindCSS to display loan data
